DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe United States America ( USA ) . The purpose study test whether insulin detemir safe least effective alternative insulin glargine control blood glucose basal/bolus therapy patient type I diabetes .

DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes least 12 month Current treatment basalbolus insulin regimen equal 3 month HbA1c le equal 11.0 % Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy Recurrent major hypoglycaemia Impaired hepatic renal function Cardiac problem uncontrolled hypertension
